propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.className: className applied to the root element.
propDescriptions.onMonthChange:
Callback firing on month change @DateIOType.

Signature:
function(month: TDate) => void | Promise
month: The new year.
returns (void | Promise): -
propDescriptions.shouldDisableMonth:
Disable specific months dynamically. Works like shouldDisableDate but for month selection view @DateIOType.

Signature:
function(month: TDate) => boolean
month: The month to check.
returns (boolean): If true the month will be disabled.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.
